remark: Installed hatches in wellhead module. Removed scaffolding in moonppol. Removed cantilever walkway. Removed conflicting scaffolding. Relocated goods/carriers on maindeck to give way for cantilever and gangway when skidded to F-12.
Held toolbox talk prior to skidding rig.
Skidded rig from F-4 to F-12.
Removed covers/bushings on slot F-12 in wellhead module.
Held toolbox talk prior to making up 36" hole opener BHA.
Made up 36" hole opener BHA.
Had problems with PRS when picking assembly from derrick. Troubleshot PRS.
Continued to m/u and RIH with 36" hole opener BHA.
Continued to RIH with 36" hole opener BHA.
Held toolbox talk prior to technichans working on TDS.
Performed dropped object checks on TDS.
Calibrated MWD depth sensor towards block positions.
Performed dummy connection with TDS. Adjusted make up sequence on TDS to avoid jamming torque wrench. Mærsk maintenance hours.
Held toolbox talk prior to repairs on TDS. Mærsk maintenance hours.
Performed repair work on TDS. Mærsk maintenance hours.
Continued to RIH with 36" hole opener on 5 1/2" HWDP. Tagged seabed at 145,2 m MD RT.
Washed down from seabed to 149 m MD at 900 lpm with 36" hole opener.  ROV observed centralizer guide bushing land in template funnel. Parked ROV in top hat before starting to rotate.
Drilled 36" hole section from 149 m to 221 m MD. Drilling parameters : Rotation 80 rpm /  WOB 3 MT / Flow 4500 lpm / Torque 4-9 kNm. Swept hole clean with 15 m3 his-vis on conncetion.
Continued drillig 36" hole section from 221 m to 250 m MD. Drilling parameters : Rotation 80 rpm /  WOB 3-5 MT / Flow 4500 lpm / Torque 6-13 kNm. Swept hole clean with 15 m3 his-vis on conncetion.
Continued drilling 36" hole section from 250 to 258 m MD. Drilling parameters : Rotation 80 rpm / WOB 5 MT / flow 4500 lpm / Torque 3-7 kNm.
Circulated hole clean at 4500 lpm / SPP 94 bar. Took final survey on TD - 0,15 deg. Swept hole with 25 m3 hi-vis pumping at 4500 lpm.
Displaced well to 1,40 sg WBM pumping at 4250 lpm. Pumped at total of 105 m3 WBM.
POOH with 36" hole opener BHA on 5 1/2" HWDP to 150 m MD.
Topped up well by pumping 5 m3 of 1,40 sg WBM.
Continued to POOH with 36" hole opener BHA. Racked back 5 1/2" HWDP and DC.
Broke out an laid down MWD. Laid out 36" hole opener BHA, lifted same to maindeck for backload.
Performed FG inspection of TDS and derrick.
Held toolbox talk prior to rigging up 30" conductor handling/running equipment.
Rigged up 30" conductor handling/running equipment.
Held toolbox talk prior to running 30" conductor. Deck crew recieved helicopter.
Halted operations due to PORT FWD crane down.
Ran 30" conductor shoe joint, 6 x intermediate joints and ST-2 x RL-4 x-over from RT to 96 m MD. Checked float - ok.
Removed 30" elevator. Removed long bails. Installed short bails and 5 1/2" elevator. Brought 30" conductor housing to catwalk cradles.

Picked up 30" conductor housing with handling CART. Made up RL-4 connection using manual tongs to 35 000 ft lbs. Engaged anti rotation dogs. Ran in with 30" conductor and installed top up pipe on XMT deck from 25 m below ML.
Installed C-plate in rotary and landed 30" conductor housing in same.
Broke out and laid down handling CART from 30" conductor housing. Filled 30" conductor with water. Rigged up C-plate, bowl and slips for running 4 3/4" aluminium inner string inside 30" conductor.
Ran 4 3/4" aluminium inner string inside 30" conductor down to 20 m below RT.
Continued to run 4 3/4" aluminium inner string inside 30" conductor down to 91 m below RT. Installed centralizers on joint #3 and #6. Rigged down 4 3/4" handling equipment.
Held toolbox talk prior to installing CART in 30" conductor housing.
Installed CART in 30" conductor housing with 5 lefthand turns. Oceaneering installed inclinometer on CART bracket. Verified filler valve open.
RIH with 30" conductor on 5 1/2" HWDP. Installed top up pipe along X-over and conductor housing. Hooked up UWG cement hose to top up pipe. Installed ROV plugs on Centralizer deck.
Continued to RIH with 30" conductor on 5 1/2" HWDP. Stabbed into template. Broke circulation and observed for return with ROV - bad visibility. Weight of string in water 105 MT.
Continued to RIH with 30" conductor. Observed up to 10 MT drag at 225 m MD.

Broke circulation and washed down with 30" conductor from 225 m to 251 m MD. Pumped at 200 lpm / 9 bar SPP. Installed cementing stand. Checked datum mark 113,25 m from top conductor housing to machined ring on Centralizer deck - ok.
Held prejob meeting prior to cementing 30" conductor.

Made up surface cement lines to cement stand. Tested lines against lo-torqe valve to 200 bar / 5 min - ok. Circulated at 2500 lpm / SPP 12 bar. ROV checked for leakage in plugs on 30" conductor housing - ok. Inserted hotstab with ROV, actuated centralizer dogs in template funnel using minireel hydraulic supply from surface.
Pumped 103 m3 of 1,52 sg X-lite cement slurry with cement unit. Pump pressure during displacement 15 bar. Displacement rate 900 lpm. Hook weight fell from 115 MT to 110 MT throughout cement job.
Displaced cement with seawater at 1200 lpm. Pressure relatively steady around 17 bar. Pumped a total of 8,5 m3 leaving theoretical TOC at 247 m MD inside 30" conductor.

Waited on cement to set up.

Meanwhile :
-Flushed and washed cement unit
-Brought tensioning system parts to Centralizer deck
-Broke out and laid down Drillcollar
-Prepared for running LP riser

Waited on cement to set up.

Meanwhile :
-Prepared and tested lines for top up job
-Brought tensioning system parts to Centralizer deck

Held toolbox talk prior to pumping operation. Assessed cool cement sample - still fingersoft.  Lined up cement unit to UWG hose and top up pipe. Circulated at 30 lpm to check for potential flow bypass above cement on lower UWG shoe. Pressure built up to 5 bar with linear build, maintained pressure for 5 min, no pressure drop. Volume pumped 193 liter. Halted operation, bled back pressure and continued wating on cement to set up.

Restarted pumping operation to check cement shoe and burst disk on top up pipe. Pumped down cement unit and top up pipe. Pressured up to 53 bar / 189 l, burst disk at 14 m below ML / 159 m MD ruptured.
Attempted to do circulation test through UWG cement hose/ top up pipe. Got alarm on overpressured cement unit. Released pressure, but control screen froze up.
Troubleshooting on Halliburton control screen. Unable to sign out alarms / system freeze.

By manual operation of cement unit. Stepped up rate through cement hose / top up pipe to 500 lpm, obtained same pressure drop as previously i.e. 50 bar at 500 lpm indicating open flow above bursted disk at 14 m below ML / 159 m TVD.

Held pre job meeting. Prepared for cement job. Got ROV in position to operate centralizing rods in funnel, shifted handles and pressured up thorugh minireel to retract rods - ok. Started mixing cement.
Performed remedial cement job. Pumped 10 m3 1,56 G-cement slurry. Pump pressure during cementing 70 bar. Pump rate 500 lpm. Displaced cement down cement hose and top up pipe with 1,1 m3 SW.

Broke cement hose in moonpool, inserted cement hose release ball. Let ball drop by gravity. Pressured up on cement unit and released cement hose. Flushed through manifold and cement hose. Flushed and cleaned cement unit.
Held toolbox talk prior to pulling CART.

Released CART from 30" conductor housing with 5 righthand turns.

Readings on inclinometer before release:
Pitch 0,25 / Roll 0,021
Broke out cement stand and laid out same. Pulled CART clear of template.
Pumped sponge for cleaning the 5 1/2 HWDP landing string.
Held prejob/information meeting for running LP drilling riser. Whole crew attended.
Held toolbox talk prior to pulling CART.
Repaired hydraulic leak on TDS.
POOH with CART on 5 1/2" HWDP. Laid out CART. Rigged handling equipment for 4 3/4" inner string.
Held toolbox talk prior to pulling 4 3/4" aluminium cement stinger.
POOH with 4 3/4" aluminium cement stinger and centralizers, laid down on pipe deck.
Cleaned and tidied drillflloor. Removed handling equipment for 30" condcutor and innerstring.
Held toolbox talk prior to installing cradles in HTS.
Installed cradles on HTS. Installed protector busing in Tensioner deck.
Held toolbox talk prior to installing riser spider.
Removed master bushing and installed riser spider. Installed hydraulic lines and function tested spider. Installed protector bushing and tension ring in Centralizer deck.

Picked up Stress joint / DCI joint -  1st double, by simultaneous lift by deckcrane and TDS. Landed double in spider. Removed handling flange and installed guide rods on flange, installed gasket ring. Picked up 2nd double and landed on flange. Made up nuts according to Bandak procedure.
Continued making up flange according to Bandak procedure. Removed hatch covers on slot #11 and #13. Rearranged sheaves for guidewires and ran guidewires to Centralizer deck.

Ran in with LPDR to 30 m MD, stopped when guide sling in level with scaffolding below Centralizer deck. Ran out guidewire and hooked guidewires into slings above RL-4 connector. Ran aft guidewire and hooked onto eagle clamp on template by ROV. Ran in to 80 m MD and landed LPDR in spider.

Strilhav on near standby from 01.30 to 04.00 due to personnel working on scaffolding deck below Centralizer deck.

Picked up 3rd double. Installed guide rods on flange, installed gasket ring. Landed double on flange. Made up nuts according to Bandak procedure. RIH with LPDR to 80 m MD. Removed handling flange. ROV hooked up FWD guidewire to eagle clamp on template.
Picked up splash zone / upper pup - 4th double. Installed guide rods on flange, installed gasket ring. Landed double on flange.
Continued to make up 3rd and 4th double LPDR according to Bandak procedure. RIH with LPDR to 105 m MD, landed on spider, removed handling tool.

Picked up tensioner joint - last single. Installed guide rods on flange, installed gasket ring. Landed tensioner joint on flange in riser spider. Made up flange according to Bandak procedure. RIH with LPDR to 122 m MD.
Held toolbox talk prior to making up landing string.
Made up to joints/connections in landing string to 67500 Nm, applied threadlock.
Made up landing string to LPDR running tool / flange, applied threadlock. Removed riser spider and installed master bushing.

Ran in with LPDR on landing string to 2 m above 30" conductor housing. Tensioned up guidewires. While observing with ROV, stabbed LPDR RL-4 connector onto 30" conductor housing. Using rig tongs, made up RL-4 connection to 40650 Nm with CCW rotation. Performed overpull test with 10 MT and maintained overpull.
Held toolbox talk prior to assembling tensioning system.

Elevated Tension ring with chain hoists on Centralizer deck. Installed brass bushing and Boat collision stool on Centralizer deck.

Meanwhile=>During ROV inspection on 30" conductor housing, observed that steel band for conductor ROV plugs was misalligned. Two ringbolts were missing. Assessed situation, conferred with shore and made contingency plan for getting the band back in place. Moved steelband back in place using ROV manipulator arm - obtained good fit on bolt holes and verified that steelband still was thight.

Installled Contact ring and tensioner ring assembly on Centralizer deck.

Meanwhile performed repair activities on conductor housing steelband. Welded/prepared threaded T- bars for replacing lost eyebolts on steelband. Dove ROV, inserted and made up threaded T-bars in steelband / ROV plug boltholes.

Cut slings on guidewires using hydraulic cutter. Retrieved FWD and AFT guidewire. Installed and secured hatches on F-11 and F-13 openings on Centralizer deck, removed scaffolding. Tided Centralizer deck.
Elevated and made up contact ring to serrated area on tensioning joint. Made up Tensioner ring assembly and made up to Tension ring. Mounted 2 tensioning cylinders to tensioning assembly.

Continued to work on tensioning system on Centralizer deck. Mounted tensioning cylinders. Made up nuts on Contact ring. Tested hydrualic system. Tranferred tension to tensioning cylinders by applying 90 bar pressure on each equivalent to 150 MT total tension.
Slacked off weight on block. Broke out Tension joint running tool/flange on Tensioning deck.
Held toolbox talk prior to pulling LPDR running tool/flange.
POOH with landing string, broke and laid down same. Broke out running tool/flange.
Installed cradles on HTS for handling overshot joint. Picked up overshot joint and landed off on top of LPDR Tension joint. Torqued up bolts in overshot.
Made repairs on TDS. Serviced TDS counterbalance and rotating head. Meanwhile installed new actuator on flowline isolation valve.
Rigged TDS with long slings for running diverter. Removed master bushing. Lifted diverter into diverter housing.
Secured overshot joint with tugger in moonpool due to movements in same. Landed diverter on overshot joint. Made up diverter to overshot joint.

Changed dye block retaining plate on TDS.

Meanwhile worked to function flowline isolation valve.

Filled conductor with seawater. Observed leakage above diverter (environmental barrier).

Meanwhile worked to function flowline isolation valve.
Held handover meeting on drillfloor. Held toolbox talk prior to picking up 26" drillout BHA.

Picked up and installed 12 1/4" x 17 1/2" x 26" drillout BHA. Gauged bit.

Meanwhile worked to function flowline isolation valve.

Pick up and make up 9 3/4" DC.

Meanwhile worked to function flowline isolation valve.

Continued making up 26" drillout BHA. RIH with 26" drillout BHA to 180 m MD.

Meanwhile worked to function flowline isolation valve.

Worked to function flowline isolation valve.

Meanwhile :
-Changed conveyer belt on HTS
-Treated pit #5,#6 and #7 with H2S scavanger
-Laid out HPDR on pipedeck

Worked to function flowline isolation valve.

Meanwhile .
-Preparing for making up HPDR in doubles on pipedeck
-Transferred slop from pit #6 to DCI holding tank

Function tested flowline isolation valve from Koomey unit. Could not operate valve from BOP panel due to lacking signal from PLC. Managed to operate flowline isolation valve manually. 

Meanwhile .
-Worked on TDS and flowline actuator.
-Performed daily maintenace, PMs and housekeeping.
-Emptied flowline to trip tank.
-Greased flowline isolation valve periodically during testing.
Held tool box meeting prior to drilling out shoe track. Focused on potential for stuck pipe.
RIH with 26" hole opner BHA from 180 m to 222 m. Washed down from 222 m with 2000 lpm, 12 bar. Tagged cement at 250 m with 3 ton. Up weight 94 t/ Down weight 97 t.
Drilled cmt/shoe track with 26" hole opner BHA; 3000 lpm, 50 rpm and 1-3 ton wob. Picked bit off bottom and stopped pumps.

Function tested diverter system. Ran diverting sequence on port and aft overboard lines from BOP panel. Verified visually that diverter element closed, flowline isolation valve closed and diverter line valve opened.

Continued to drill cmt/shoe track from 250 m until 26" hole opener was out of 30" conductor shoe; 3000 lpm, 50 rpm and 1-3 ton wob. Reamed shoe track every 1-2 m. Pumped 15 m3 1.12 sg hi-vis pill and circulated out same. Noticable increase in cuttings observed.
Drilled 2 m new formation with 26" hole opner BHA; 3000 lpm, 55 rpm and 1 ton wob. Reamed rate hole and shoe track.

Drilled 1,5 m new formation with 26" hole opner BHA; 3000 lpm, 55 rpm and 0.5-1 ton wob. Reamed rat hole. Pumped 15 m3 1.12 sg hi-vis pill and circulated out same. Meanwhile held tool box meeting for manual handling of BHA.
Pulled through shoe track without rotation to verify no restrictions and continued POOH to 141 m.
Malfunction of forward PRS. Trouble-shooted same and found failure on proximity switch.
Continued POOH with 26" HO BHA and racked back same.
Held tool box meeting prior to removing master bushing and diverter inserts. Removed inserts.
Continued POOH with 26" HO BHA and racked back same.

POOH with 26" HO BHA from 29 m to 8 m and racked back same. Held tool box meeting prior to POOH with 12 1/4" x 17 1/2" x 26" hole opener assembly. Removed master bushing and LO 26" HO BHA. Cleared rig floor.
Held pre-job meeting. PU and RIH with 8 1/2" pilot hole BHA to 32 m.
Held tool box meeting prior to installing radioactive source. Barried off wellhead, moonpool and rigfloor. Installed radioactive source into ADN according to Schlumberger procedure.
Continued to PU and RIH with 8 1/2" pilot hole BHA from 32 m to 225 m. Meanwhile recovered ROV to surface to repair camera.

Raw water pumpe failed and left rig with only 1 out of 3 pumpes available. Due to the criticality of the pump delivering firewater, cooling water etc the drilling operation is postphoned until the pump is replaced. 

-Meanwhile held tool box meeting to install diverter elements. Removed master bushing and  replaced torn 22" outer diverter elements by new 18" elements.
-Meanwhile held tool box meeting prior to POOH. POOH with 8 1/2" BHA from 212 m to 32 m.
-Meanwhile cleared rig floor before handling radioactive sources. Removed batteries.
- Meanwhile continued POOH to 17 m.

Waited on boat to arrive with raw water pump. Meanwhile continued to LO BHA from 17 m to surface. Cleaned and cleared rig floor of excess equipment. Lowered foldable finger board, changed inserts in fox hole and arranged equipment in set back prior to PU 3 1/2" DP. Held tool box meeting prior to MU 3 1/2" DP.
MU and RB 3 1/2" DP. Changed dies in aft PRS. Meanwhile started installation of raw water pump.
MU and RB 3 1/2" DP. Meanwhile trouble-shooted raw water pump failure and performed rig maintenance, housekeeping and monitored well on trip tank. Found leak rate of 200 l/hour.

Waiting on trouble-shooting of raw water pump failure.

-Meanwhile removed master busing, installed 18" and 10" diverter inserts and re-installed master bushing.
-Meanwhile worked with mechanic on TDS.
-Meanwhile observed leak rate of 250 l/hour. Found leaking valve on flowline valve. Actuator misaligned and unable to fully close flowline 
-Meanwhile dumped pit 6 (active) and filled with fresh seawater. Dressed all 6 shakers with 20/80 mesh screens.
Waiting on trouble-shooting of raw water pump failure. Meanwhile worked on flowline valve and actuator and stopped observed leakage.

Waiting of raw water pump repair. 

-Meanwhile performed rig maintenance, performed dropped object survey punch items and prepared equipment for 26" section.
- Meanwhile monitored well on trip tank. Loss rate of approx. 100 l/hour recorded.
- Meanwhile performed man ride service on TDS  and 2 PRS and changed out valve on diverter system.
-Meanwhile had derrick inspection.
Waiting of raw water pump repair. Meanwhile PU and RIH with 8 1/2" pilot hole BHA to 246 m. Schlumberger fitted fresh batteries and loaded RA source.
Waiting of raw water pump repair. Meanwhile PU and RIH with 8 1/2" pilot hole BHA from 246 to 251 m.

Had pre-job meeting with all personnel on shallow gas procedure. Performed shallow gas drill inside shoe at 251 m. Pumped 900 lpm, 15 bar and operated diverter bag and observed flow being re-directed through port overboard line. Switched between pits on the fly.

Pumped 27m3 1.60 sg mud at 2000 lpm, 110 bar and displaced out of bit using seawater. Flow checked well for 1 hour. Had stable loss rate of 120 l/hour eqvivalent to the loss rate monitored on the trip tank prior to the  FIT. Picked up 1 stand and circulated out upper part of 1.60 sg mud, 2000 lpm and 84.5 bar. RIH with 1 stand and circulated out remaining 1.60 sg mud.
Drilled 8 1/2" pilot hole BHA from 261.4 m to 296 mMD, 2000 lpm, 89 bar, 60 rpm, 1-4 kNm, 1-3 MT wob, ECD 1.19 SG, ROP 9 m/hr. BHA WT 23 MT. WT below jar 15 MT.
PU off bottom and circulated due to riser leak. Pumped out to shoe from 296 m to 251 m, 890 lpm and 10 rpm. Located leak to be in wellhead connector, 70-80 l/hr.
Flow checked well over trip tank while waiting on decision. Leakage stopped and well flow checked ok. Meanwhile performed general maintenance and houskeeping.

RIH with 8 1/2" pilot hole BHA from 251 to 290 m. MU TDS and washed down from 290 m to 296 m. Drilled 8 1/2" pilot hole from 296 m to 399 mMD, 2000 lpm, 90-98 bar, 60-120 rpm, 1-4 kNm, 1-3 MT wob, ECD 1.20 SG, ROP 15-20 m/hr.
Circulated and reciprocated btms up, 2000/2250 lpm, 100/114 bar, due to rapide increase in ECD to 1.23 SG. Diluted and conditioned mud from 1.14 sg to 1.12 sg.
Drilled 8 1/2" pilot hole from 399 m to 415 mMD, 2250 lpm, 112 bar, 120 rpm, 2-3 kNm, 1-3 MT wob, ECD 1.21-1.23 SG, ROP 10-46 m/hr, Inc 0.46 deg.
Drilled 8 1/2" pilot hole from 415 m to 467 mMD, 2272 lpm, 116 bar, 120 rpm, 2-3 kNm, 1-3 MT wob, ECD 1.23-1.25 SG, ROP 36 m/hr.
Circulated and reciprocated btms up, 2272 lpm, 116 bar, due to rapide increase in ECD to 1.27 SG. Diluted and conditioned mud from 1.15 sg to 1.12 sg.

Drilled 8 1/2" pilot hole from 467 m to 473 mMD, 2272 lpm, 116 bar, 120 rpm, 2-3 kNm, 1-2 MT wob, ECD 1.25 SG, ROP 37 m/hr. Observed gain of 1 m3 in active. PU off btm and flow checked well static for 15 min. Ok.
Circulated btms up, 2272 lpm, 116 bar. No gas observed. Meanwhile diluted and conditioned mud  to 1.12 sg.
Drilled 8 1/2" pilot hole from 476 m to 525 mMD, 2272 lpm, 116 bar, 120 rpm, 2-3 kNm, 1-2 MT wob, ECD 1.23 SG. Reduced ROP from 36 m/hr to 30 m/hr at 500 m according to program.
Drilled 8 1/2" pilot hole from 525 m to 618 mMD, 2250 lpm/115 bar, 120 rpm/1-6 kNm, 2-15 MT wob, ECD 1.21-1.23 SG. Limited 30 m/hr according to program. ROV monitored wellhead connector.
Reamed full stand and circulated well clean, 2250 lpm 115 bar. Racked back one stand.
MU TDS, rotated 10 rpm and flow checked well. Total loss 140 l over 1.5 hr. Meanwhile checked rollers and dies on AFT PRS.
Prepared to wash std down. Unable to open flowline isolation valve.
Trouble-shooted  and repaired flowline isolation valve. Meanwhile POOH from 578 m to shoe at 251 m.
Trouble-shooted  and repaired flowline isolation valve. Meanwhile performed general housekeeping.
Repaired flowline isolation valve. Meanwhile performed general maintenance and housekeeping. Performed derrick inspection and monitored well on trip tank. Stable loss rate 170 l/hr (LPDR connector).
Washed down from 251 m to 618 m, 2250 lpm/109 bar. No fill.
Had pre-job meeting with new night crew on shallow gas procedure and function tested flowline isolation valve 5 times.

Drilled 8 1/2" pilot hole from 618 m to 685 m, 2250 lpm/114 bar, 120 rpm/1-3 kNm, 1-3 MT wob, ECD 1.21-1.24 SG. Observed losses, 3 m3/15 min at 655 m. Circulated with reduced flow, 1800 lpm. Increased flow rate to 2250 lpm and observed loss of 200 l/min. Total loss was 10 m3.

Drilled 8 1/2" pilot hole from 685 m to 780 m, 2250 lpm/115 bar, 120 rpm/1-4 kNm, 1-3 MT wob, ECD 1.21-1.25 SG. Circulated and reamed one std every 3 hours due to high ECD reading of 1.27 SG. No loss observed.
Drilled 8 1/2" pilot hole from 780 m to 870 m, 2250 lpm/117 bar, 120 rpm/1-3 kNm, 3-4 MT wob, ECD 1.25 SG.
Circulated hole clean prior to drilling through Utsira formation, 2250 lpm/113 bar, 120 rpm/1-3 kNm.
Continue to drill 8 1/2" pilot hole from 870 m to 890 m, 2250 lpm/117 bar, 120 rpm/1-3 kNm, 0-6 MT wob, ECD 1.25 SG. Observed increasing WOB from 880 to 882 followed by no WOB from 882 m to 886 m.
Circulated hole clean, 2250 lpm/113 bar, 120 rpm/1-3 kNm.

Function tested flowline isolation valve 5 times. Displaced well to seawater, 2250 lpm/102 bar, 100 rpm/1-3 kNm. Flow checked well and observed loss of 500 l/hr. Observed increasing leak rate on connector using seawater.

Pumped 10 m3 hi-vis pill and started drilling 8 1/2" pilot hole from 890 m to 941 m2250 lpm/105 bar, 120 rpm/1-3 kNm, 0-1 MT wob, ECD 1.12 - 1.20 SG . Pumped 10 m3 hi-vi pills according to program. Had to back-ream 1 std every 5-10 m due to high ECD readings. Meanwhile decided to displace well to WBM.

Prepared for connection at 941 m and had 10 MT WOB at 934 m, 120 rpm. Slowed down to 30 rpm and re-ran in and got 5 MT WOB at 934 m (had 0-1 MT WOB while drilling this section). Pulled back to 910 m and circulated and swept 2 x 5m3 hi-vis pills. Took time-out to discuss further action. Meanwhile had boat delivering drillwater for mixing mud.
Mixed 1.08 sg mud and displaced well to same, 2250 lpm/105 bar, 30 rpm/1-3 kNm.

Drilled 8 1/2" pilot hole from 941 m to 1178 m, 2250 lpm/111 bar, 120 rpm/1-5 kNm, 1-2 MT wob, ECD 1.14-1.20 SG. Reamed each stand. Took weight at 978 m, 1027 m, 1040 m and 1060 m, while reaming. Worked through tight spots and continued drilling. Observed max gas  reading of 0.6%. Stringer at 1002-1003 m.
Rig ESD system had shut-down. Managed to rotate string 10 rpm and pump 200 lpm with cement unit.
Reamed 1 std and circulated btms up, 2250 lpm/101 bar, 125 rpm/1-5 kNm. Lost 2 m3/hr over shakers due to high amount of cuttings.
Waiting on Geoservices to have their sensors reading data. Meanwhile reamed and circulated 2250 lpm/101 bar.
Waiting on Geoservices to have their sensors reading data. Meanwhile reamed and circulated 2250 lpm/101 bar.
Drilled 8 1/2" pilot hole from 1178 m to 1262 m, 2250 lpm/105 bar, 125 rpm/2-3 kNm, 1-4 MT wob, ECD 1.19-1.28 SG. Reamed each stand. Reamed and circulated when experienced high ECD readings.
Drilled 8 1/2" pilot hole from 1262 m to 1353 m, 2250 lpm/108 bar, 125 rpm/2-5 kNm, 1-4 MT wob, ECD 1.19-1.28 SG. Reamed each stand. Reamed and circulated when experienced high ECD.
Circulated 2 x btms up, 2250 lpm/108 bar, 125 rpm/2-5 kNm.
Flow check well prior to displace well to 1.40 sg WBM. Meanwhile held tool-box talk for displacement.
Displaced well to 50 m3 of 1.40 sg WBM, 1200 lpm/8 bar, 80 rpm/1-4 kNm. Max ECD 1.21 sg.
POOH with 8 1/2" BHA from 1353 m to 294 m. Observed 2 MT max drag. Meanwhile placed cuttings funnel on F-4 using moonpool tugger.
Pumped 13 m3 of 1.40 sg WBM at 290 m, 900 lpm/11 bar, 10 rpm/1-3 kNm, to displace lower part of 30" conductor to heavy mud.
POOH with 8 1/2" BHA from 294 m to 32 m. RB 5.5" HWDP and 6 3/4" DC.
POOH and LO 8 1/2" BHA from 32 m to OOH. Removed RA source from MWD tool and dumped memory data.
Cleared and cleaned drill floor. Prepared removal of diverter. Installed sadle and cradle on HTS. Held tool-box talk with crew. Installed lifting bolts on diverter.
Removed broken stud from diverter locking dog. Installed new lifting bolt. Bled off pressure in tension system from 90 bar to 60 bar and observed easier movement of locking dog.
Held tool-box meeting prior to lifting diverter to rig floor. Lifted with weight of diverter (10 MT) + overpull (2 MT) and diverter came free. RB same in set back area and secured.
Attached slings to chackles in bails in TDS to overshot joint. Removed tension bolts using Bandak Bolt Tensioning Tool. LO overshot joint and removed slings.
Held tool-box meeting. RIH and MU up flange connection to tensioner joint using 19 studs on B-type flange. Meanwhile installed riser spider and function tested same.

Held tool-box meeting. Reduced pressure on tensioner cylinders in 20 bar steps from 150 MT to 55 MT (weight of LPDR when ran was 42 MT). Picked up 60 MT + block weight with TDS (reading 130 MT). Bled off all pressure on tensioner cylinders, leaving all riser tension in TDS. Dismantled tensioner system.
WOW to disconnect and POOH with LPDR.
WOW to disconnect and POOH with LPDR. Meanwhile prepared equipment for LO 6 3/4" DC. LD 1 std 6 3/4" DC in singles.
WOW to disconnect and POOH with LPDR. Meanwhile LO 6 3/4" DC.
Re-installed riser trolly and cradle onto HTS. RD remainder of tensioner system prior to pulling LPDR. Held pre-job meeting prior to pulling LPDR.

Used rig tongs and turned LPDR 1/2 turn to the right to release RL-4 connection, release torque 50 kNm. Observed disconnect with ROV. PU clear of conductor and lifted LPDR up to rig floor slowly until first flange was above spider dogs. String WT 45 MT. Engaged spider dogs and inserted stop bolts. Landed LPDR.
BO and LD 3 LPDR joints in singles (tension joint, upper pup joint and splash zone joint),  using 5 1/2" elevator attached to handling flange B.
BO and LD 3 LPDR standard joints in singles using 5 1/2" elevator attached to handling flange A.
BO and LD 3 LPDR standard joints in singles using 5 1/2" elevator attached to handling flange A.

Drilled firm cement from 1326 m MD to 1330 m MD. Drilling parameters : Flow 4000-4500 lpm / SPP 130-160 bar / 80-90 rpm / 3-10 MT WOB / Torque 10-20 kNm - string stalled out on occasions. Reamed as required. Drilled float collar at 1330 m MD.
Drilled cement in shoetrack from 1330 m to 1355 m MD. Drilling parameters 4000 lpm / SPP 130 bar / 90 rpm / 3-5 MT WOB / Torque 16 kNm.
Continued drilling cement in shoetrack from 1355 m to 1358 m MD. Drilling parameters 4000 lpm / SPP 130 bar / 90 rpm / 3-5 MT WOB / Torque 16 kNm.

Drilled cement in rathole from 1358 m to 1367,5 m MD. Drilling parameters 4000 lpm / SPP 131 bar / 50-80 rpm / 3 MT WOB / Torque 15 kNm. Reamed back to shoe for every 2 m drilled. Reamed through shoe without rotation last time - no obstructions. Performed toolbox talk prior to displacement.

Displaced well to 1,35 sg Performadrill KCl mud. Pumped 25 m3 hi-vis followed by 30 m3 of drillwater and 220 m3 1,35 sg Performadrill. Pump rate 2000-4000 lpm / SPP 80-190 bar / rotation 20 rpm. Closed dumpline valve and routed interface mud to pit#12.
Routed mud returns to pit#7 and circulated on closed system. Picked up single 5 1/2" DP for drilling rathole.
Drilled from 1367,5 m to 1372 m MD with reduced ROP due to problems with cold mud overflowing the shakers.
Criculated and conditioned mud at reduced rate 2200 lpm due to overflowing on shakers.
Pulled back into 20" casing without pumping.
Circulated and conditioned mud with bit inside 20" casing. Changed shaker screens to 145 mesh. Established flowrate of 4500 lpm.
Lined up cement unit down standpipe and kill line. Flushed lines with mud prior to XLOT. Closed BOP on 5 1/2" DP.
Performed XLOT. Pressured up 1st cycle at 100 lpm. Did not achieve expected response.
Verified line up by closing in and releasing 10 bar down drillstring and kill line - ok.
Continued XLOT.  Pumped 1000 liter at 100 lpm to get to 8-10 bar, zeroed counter. Pumped an additional 500 liter to 26 bar. Unexpected respons. Bled back pressure.

Pressured up again with same volume at 200 lpm. Monitored trip tank for leakage above BOP - none detected. Repeated cycle twice more up to approx 50 bar at 100/200 lpm. No definitive leak off pressure could be determined. Prepared for work on standpipe valves.
Dismanteled manual choke valve on standpipe manifold. Greased valve S2, 10 and 11.
Pressure tested standpipe manifold. Valves S3, 6, 7, 8 and 11 tested ok.

Lined up pumps and flowline for drilling. Stepped up rate to 4500 lpm. Cycled flowrates 3800/4500 lpm to set Powerdrive according to instructions from DD. Fast procedure failed. Reverted to long procedure, Powerdrive set - ok.
Drilled 17 1/2" section from 1372 m to 1422 m MD. Inserted and drilled with 1 singel to complete tally. Drilling parameters : Flow 4500 lpm / SPP 235 bar / 120 rpm / 10 MT WOB / Torque 15-20 kNm.

Started setting Powerdrive for corrections needed according to directional plan. Cycled rate 3800/4500 lpm. Had overload of cuttings conveyer belt which was shut down by safety switch. Had to stop pumping because the cuttings conveyer belt had stopped.
Worked to clean and re-start cuttings conveyer belt.
Continued cycling rate at 3800/4500 lpm to set Powerdrive. Continued drilling from 1422 m to 1431 m MD.
Drilled 17 1/2" section from 1431 m to 1436 m MD. Had to stop drilling due to prevailing problems with cuttings conveyer belt. Not able to restart belt.

Conveyer belt could not be restarted as the shute in which the belt is running was full of cuttings. Opened forward shute on conveyer system to bring cuttings forward into skip. Emptied conveyer screws in shaker room into skips. Removed cuttings from conveyer belt shute with HP guns, fire hoses and suction hoses. Cleaned up cuttings from deck.

Meanwhile circulated well with low rate and rotated string at 20 rpm.

Continued drilling 17 1/2" section from 1436 m to 1461 m MD. Drilling prameters : Flow 4500 lpm / SPP 238 bar / 130 rpm / 2-3 MT WOB / ECD 1,37 sg / Torque 16 kNm. Restricted ROP to 30 m/hrs to check capacity of cuttings transport on conveyer belt.
Drilled 17 1/2" hole from 1461 to 1476 m MD. Drilling parameters : Flow 4500 lpm / SPP 239 bar / 150 rpm / 5-10 MT WOB / Torque 18 kNm. ECD: 1,375 SG
Took survey and downlinked Powerdrive by cycling rate 3800/4500 lpm. Observed blockage on cuttings conveyer screw in shaker room.
Took SCR and calibrated MWD depth. Meanwhile worked to open blockage in cuttings convery screw.
Worked to open blockage/remove cuttings from conveyer screws in shaker room.
Made connection and synchronized Powerdrive.
Continued drilling 17 1/2" section from 1476 m to 1512 m MD. ECD: 1,375 SG
Cycled pumprate 3800/4500 lpm to downlink Powerdrive. Blockage on cuttings conveyer screw in shaker room.
Worked to open blockage/remove cuttings from conveyer screws in shaker room.
Made connection and took MWD survey.
Continued drilling 17 1/2" section from 1512 m to 1546 m MD. Cuttings conveyer belt on main deck stopped moving/packed with cuttings.
Attempted to unplug/clean conveyer belt - nogo. Decided to pull into casing shoe while making repairs and modifications to the conveyer belt system.
POOH with 17 1/2" drilling BHA from 1546 m to 1467 m MD. Tight hole took approx 30 MT overpull.
Continued POOH with 17 1/2" drilling BHA while pumping from 1467 m to 1354 m MD inside casing.
Lined up well on triptank. Changed from PS-30 to manual slips. Static losses approx 100 l/hrs.

Made modifications to cuttings conveyer belt :
-Cut and fitted drainage hatch
-Prepared IBC underneath drain
-Fit bracket for flushing with fire hoses
-Narrowed orifice of discharge shute

Meanwhile serviced top drive. Tested path for cuttings transport and fluid discharge through the DCI system - ok.

Static losses 30 l/hrs.
Continued making modifications to cuttings conveyer belt.

RIH with 17 1/2" drilling BHA from 1354 m to 1541 m MD. Pumped at 2000 lpm on way in / no rotation. Took weight and reamed through ledges at 1390 m MD and 1396 m MD. Meanwhile continued modifications on cuttings conveyer belt.

Tagged fill at 1541 m MD. Stepped up rate to 4500 lpm. Worked to get stable conditions on shakers and cuttings conveyer belt. Took cuttings partly to conveyer belt and partly to DCI unit with overboard discharge. Cut back rate to 3500 lpm to get stable condtions on shakers.
Washed from 1541 m to 1546 m MD. Parameters : Flow 3500 lpm / SPP 162 bar / 120 rpm / <1 MT WOB / Torque 13 kNm.

Drilled 17 1/2" hole section from 1546 m to 1859 m MD. Driling parameters : Flow 4500 lpm / SPP 248 bar / 180 rpm / 3-5 MT WOB / Torque 14-23 kNm / ECD 1,37-1,38.

Took surveys on connections. Reamed stand before connections. Downlinked Powerdrive at 10:15. 

Experienced problems with Mudpump #2.
Mud pump #1 down failed, washout in valve seat, shut down pump. Mud pump #1 also out of service. Had to stop drilling. Reciprocated on stand while working on mud pump #2.

Continued working on mud pump# 1 and 2. 

Meanwhile :
-Reciprocated on stand pumping 1800 lpm / rotation 30 rpm
-Attempted to make up 14" casing joints in doubles, inserts and guides on PRS to tight for 14" casing

Continued working on mud pump # 1 and #2. Attempted to remove suction valve seat - nogo. Removed the complete suction valve seat housing and replaced with housing from mud pump #1.

Meanwhile set back one stand and reciprocated on previous stand.
RIH with 17 1/2" drillng BHA for recommencement of drilling.
Continued drilling 17 1/2" section from 1859 m to 1881 m MD. Driling parameters : Flow 4500 lpm / SPP 250 bar / 180 rpm / 6 MT WOB/ Torque 20 kNm / ECD 1,38. Performed SCR.

Drilled 17 1/2" hole section from 1881 m to 1959 m MD. Drilling parametes : Flow 4500 lpm / SPP 250 bar / 180 rpm / 3-4 MT WOB /  22 kNm / ECD 1,37-1,38.
Found bent/loose die retainer plate on TDS.

Had to change die retainer plate on TDS. Circulated hole clean. Installed manual slips. Racked back 1 stand and installed side entry circulation sub. Hooked up coflex for circulation while working on TDS.
Dismanteled and replaced die retainer plate on TDS. Meanwhile circulated at 1500 lpm.
Tested torque wrench on TDS - ok. Installed automatic slips.
Continued drilling 17 1/2" hole from 1959 m to 1972 m MD. Drilling parameters : Flow 4500 lpm / SPP 255 bar / 180 rpm / 3-4 MT WOB /  22 kNm / ECD 1,37-1,38.
Shakers overflowing due to new mud being circulated. Cut back on flowrate and worked string until satisfactory flowrate of 4500 lpm could be achieved.

Continued drilling 17 1/2" hole from 1959 m to 2080 m MD. Drilling parameters : Flow 4500 lpm / SPP 246 bar / 180 rpm / 3-4 MT WOB /  21 kNm / ECD 1,37-1,38. Performed survey and reamed stand on connection. Downlinked Powerdrive as required.

Meanwhile ROV attached DCI hose to subsea clumpweights - ok.

Drilled 17 1/2" hole section from 2080 m to 2146 m MD. Drilling parameters : Flow 4500 lpm / SPP 258 bar / 180 rpm / 3-4 MT WOB /  23 kNm / ECD 1,37-1,38. Downlinked Powerdrive as required. Performed pit drill at 02:00. Bled 2-3 m3 mud into active. Good response from driller and Geoservice. Experienced problems with mud pumps, standpipe pressure eratic and lower than before.
Troubleshot problems with mudpumps, isolated one pump at the time. Problem with mud pump #2, took pump out of service. Attempted to drill ahead using mud pump #1 and #3. Got problem with mud pump #1.
Stopped drilling. Worked on mud pump #2, changed ejection valve and valve seat. Meanwhile reciprocated string pumping 1500 lpm with mud pump #3. Rotated string 20 rpm.

Continued drilling from 2150  to 2320 m MD. Drilling parameters : Flow 4500 lpm / SPP 265 bar / 180 rpm / 10-12 MT WOB / Torque 20-25 kNm / ECD 1,37-1,38. Performed survey and reamed stand on connection. Downlinked Power as required.

Drilled 17 1/2" hole section from 2320 to 2403 m MD. ROP dropped to 5-10 m/hrs, increased WOB. Drilling parameters : Flow 4500 lpm / SPP 265-272 bar / 180 rpm / 10-18 MT WOB / Torque 16-23 kNm / ECD 1,37-1,38. Top of Balder encounterd at 2345 m MD. Stick slip tendencies at 2380 m MD, reduced WOB as required.

Drilled 17 1/2" hole section 2403 m to 2417 m MD. Drilling parameters : Flow 4500 lpm / SPP 275 bar / 180 rpm / 18 MT WOB / Torque 20 kNm / ECD 1,37-1,38. 

ROP down to 4-6 m/hrs.

Due to decreasing ROP, picked 0,3 m off bottom to clean the bit. Increased pump rate to 4700 lpm and rotated at 220 rpm and held for 10 mins. Got problems with mud pump #3, took pump out of service, reciprocated on stand pumping 2000 lpm. Lined up mud pump #2. RIH and stepped up pumps to 4500 lpm for commencement of drilling.

Continued drilling 17 1/2" hole section from 2417 m to 2438 m MD. Drilling parameters : Flow 4500 lpm / SPP 276 bar / 180 rpm / 15-18 MT WOB / Torque 24-30 kNm / ECD 1,37-1,38. 

ROP increased to appox 10 m/hrs. Drilling break at 2431with ROP of 20 m/hrs. Experienced stick slip tendencies at 2436 m MD, decreased WOB as required.

Continued drilling 17 1/2" section from 2438 m to 2486 m MD. Drilling paramaters : Flow 4500 lpm / SPP 272-280 bar / 150-180 rpm / 13-15 MT WOB / Torque 17-24 kNm / ECD 1,37. Took survey and reamed singel on connection.

Got problems with mud pumps #2 and #3.

Worked on mud pumps #2 and #3.  Changed swab/piston and liner seal on pump #2. Changed liner spray hose on pump #3.

Got pump #2 up and running. Attempted to recommence drilling at 21:45. Observed leakage on TDS washpipe.

Had leakage on TDS washpipe. Installed manual slips. Installed side entry circulation sub. Connected cement hose and circulated 1300 lpm while working on washpipe. Parked topdrive and changed washpipe.
Continued changing washpipe on TDS. Greased TDS.
Finished working on TDS. Installed automatic slips. Made up stand and RIH to 2486 m MD, stepped up pumps and recommenced drilling.

Continued drilling 17 1/2" section from 2486 m to 2505 m MD. Drilling paramaters : Flow 4500 lpm / SPP 280-284 bar / 180 rpm / 8-12 MT WOB / Torque 19-25 kNm / ECD 1,37. ROP dropped from 10 m/hrs to 2 m/hrs towards 2505.

Drilled 17 1/2" section from 2505 m to 2513 m MD. Drilling parameters : Flow 4500 lpm / SPP 280-284 bar / 180 rpm / 8-12 MT WOB / Torque 19-25 kNm / ECD 1,37. ROP dropped from 2 m/hrs to 1 m/hrs towards 2513. Decided to pull out of hole to change bit.
Circulated hole clean with 4500 lpm / SPP 285 bar while reciprocating on stand.
POOH with 17 1/2" drilling BHA from 2513 m to 2254 m MD.
Tight hole from 2254. Continued POOH while pumping at 3500 lpm from 2254 to 1798 m MD.  Rotated at 40 rpm on 15 MT+ overpull as dictated by hole.
Continued POOH with 17 1/2" BHA from 1798 m to 1661 m MD pumping at 3500 lpm. Rotated at 40 rpm on 15 MT+ overpull as dicated by hole.

Due to pack off tendencies at 1661 m MD, increasing ECD > 1,40 and increasing cuttings trend over shakers => Reciprocated and circulated on stand at 4500 lpm / 20 rpm. Decreased ECD from 1,402 to 1,390 with continuous flow of cuttings over shakers.
Continued to POOH with 17 1/2" drilling BHA from 1661 m to 1523 m MD. Sticky conditions. Pumped at 3500 lpm / Rotation 40 rpm. ECD 1,39-1,40.
POOH with 17 1/2" drilling BHA from 1523 to 1439 m MD.  Sticky conditions. Increased flow rate when pulling to 4500 lpm due to increasing  ECD > 1,40. Rotated at 40 rpm.
POOH with 17 1/2" drilling BHA on 5 1/2" DP from 1439 to 1337 m MD.  Sticky conditions. Increased flow rate when pulling to 4500 lpm due to increasing  ECD > 1,40. Rotated at 40 rpm.
Circulated hole clean. Pumped at 4500 lpm. Rotation 30-40 rpm.
Flowchecked prior to POOH in 20" casing - well static. Pumped 4 m3 slug of 1,55 sg mud.
POOH with 17 1/2" drillling BHA on 5 1/2" DP from 1337m to 1335 m MD. Tight hole at 1335 m MD when stabilizer entering shoetrack. Unable to pull without swabbing.
Made up TDS to pipe and continued pulling from 1337 m to 1035 m MD while pumping at 1300-3000 lpm. Rotated as dictated by hole 10-40 rpm. At 1115 m MD increased flowrate to 4000 lpm.
POOH with 17 1/2" drilling BHA on 5 1/2" DP from 1035 m to 800 m MD. No tight spots observed. Pumped 2 m3 slug of 1,55 sg mud.
POOH with 17 1/2" drilling BHA on 5 1/2" DP from 800 m to 266 m MD. Flowchecked prior to POOH with 17 1/2" BHA - well static.
POOH with 17 1/2" drilling BHA on 5 1/2" HWDP from 266 m to 163 m MD.
Held toolbox talk. Removed automatic slip and installed master bushing.
Continued to POOH with 17 1/2" BHA. Racked back drillcollars and jar/intensifier.
With ADN sub in rotary, prepared for handling/removing RA source. Rigged up adapter and transfer shield. Fenced off drilling area. Attempted to remove RA source from ADN - nogo.

Troubleshot situation. RA source seemed to unscrew but was still hanging on threads. No back up transfer shield onboard in case shear pin release. Decided to try to pull RA source with the possible implication that back up ADN tool could not be run.
Pulled RA source using tugger. Source came free, threads seemed to be OK. Transferred RA source to transport container. Planned for picking up backup ADN and backup RA source.
Picked up 17 1/2" drilling BHA and lifted above rotary. Inspected bit. Prepared for breaking bit.
Broke out 17 1/2" PDC bit using bit breaker and manual tongs. Made up new 17 1/2" rock bit to Powerdrive. Torqued bit to 37000 ft lbs using manual tongs. Gauged bit, checked nozzles and rollers.
Broke out an laid down ADN, Sonic and ARC tools. RIH with Powerdrive and hung off same in rotary. Cleared drillfloor and prepared for service on TDS.
Worked on TDS. Checked TDS for noise while rotating. Changed gear oil on TDS.
Made up and RIH with backup ARC, backup Sonic and Powerpulse.
Made up ADN to 17 1/2" drilling BHA.
Held toolbox talk. Connected TDS and tested MWD tool pumping at 3000 lpm / SPP 50 bar - ok.
Held toolbox talk. Transferred and installed RA source in ADN tool using tranfer shield and transfer rod. Had problems to function fingers on collar fingerboard.
Troubleshot fingerboard communication with AD control panel.
RIH with 17 1/2" drilling BHA from 40 m to 205 m MD on 5 1/2" HWDP to locate RA source below sealevel.
Continued to work on collar fingerboard.
POOH with 17 1/2" drilling BHA from 205 m to 40 m MD on 5 1/2" HWDP.
Held toolbox talk prior to operating collar fingers manually.
RIH with 17 1/2" drilling BHA on DC and 5 1/2" HWDP from 40 m to 200 m MD.
Removed master bushing. Installed automatic slips.
RIH with 17 1/2" drilling BHA on 5 1/2" DP/HWDP from 200 m to 1031 m MD. Had problems with fingerboard. Meanwhile performed well control drill.
Troubleshot fingerboard.
Continued to RIH with 17 1/2" drilling BHA on 5 1/2" DP from 1031 m to 1345 m MD.
Filled drillpipe and broke circulation in shoetrack. Pumped at 3000 lpm / SPP 135 bar.
Continued to RIH with 17 1/2" drilling BHA on 5 1/2" DP from 1345 m to 1415 m MD. Reamed thightspots at 1360, 1362 and 1378 m MD with 4500 lpm / 80 RPM.
RIH with 17 1/2" drilling BHA on 5 1/2 DP from 1345 m to 2238 m MD - hole condition good.
Connected TDS, filled pipe and broke circulation.
Continued to RIH with 17 1/2" drilling BHA on 5 1/2" DP from 2238 m to 2470 m MD. Hit obstruction at 2470 m MD.

Brought pump up to 4300 lpm / SPP 293 bar and reamed with 120 rpm to clear restriction. Still took some weight on bit. Reduced rate an downlinked Powerdrive according to instructions from DD. Reamed down to 2482 with 0-2 MT WOB while setting Powerdrive.
Made connection. Performed SCR. Performed MWD survey. Reamed down to 2513 with 4300 lpm and 120 rpm.

Drilled 17 1/2" hole from 2513 m to 2523,5 m MD. Drilling parameters : Flow 4360 lpm / SPP 284-296 bar / 180 rpm / 12-19 MT WOB /  Torque 23 kNm / ECD 1,391-1,394. ROP 5-7 m/hrs. Trip gas peaked at 12000 ppm.

Performed survey. Circulated hole clean => Reciprocated on stand, increased pumprate to 4500 lpm / 293 bar SPP / rotation 120 rpm. ECD when starting 1,393. ECD at 06.00 1,389. MW out 1,37. Started to add Graphite and Calcarb to active.
Continued to circulate hole clean with 4500 lpm.
Made connection. Performed MWD survey. Stepped up pumps to drilling rate at 4500 lpm.

Continued drilling 17 1/2" hole from 2523,5 m to 2535 m MD. Drilling parameters : Flow 4500 lpm / SPP 282 bar / 180 rpm / 20 MT WOB /  Torque 24 kNm / ECD 1,38. ROP 5 m/hrs. Failure on mud pump #1 and mud pump #3.
Worked on mud pumps #1 and #3. Changed discharge valve and seat on MP#3. Changed suction valve, seat and cap seal on MP#1. Meanwhile reciprocated and circulated at 1500 lpm / 50 rpm.
Continued drilling 17 1/2" hole from 2535 m to 2541 m MD. Drilling parameters : Flow 4500 lpm / SPP 282 bar / 180 rpm / 12 MT WOB /  Torque 24 kNm / ECD 1,38. ROP 5 m/hrs.
Checked for losses - ok.
Continued drilling 17 1/2" hole from 2541 m to 2548 m MD. Drilling parameters : Flow 4500 lpm / SPP 282 bar / 180 rpm / 20 MT WOB /  Torque 24 kNm / ECD 1,38. ROP 12 m/hrs
Checked for losses - ok.

Continued drilling 17 1/2" hole from 2548 m to 2569 m MD. Drilling parameters : Flow 4500 lpm / SPP 272-280 bar / 180 rpm / 12-18 MT WOB /  Torque 24 kNm / ECD 1,37. ROP 1-2 m/hrs. Had drilling break at 2569 m MD, ROP increased to 10 m/hrs over 0,8 m drilled, then decreased again. Dynamic losses of 1-2 m3/hrs. Encountered erratic data on incl. azim. sensor on powerdrive.

Drilled 17 1/2" hole from 2569 to 2572,5 m MD. Drilling parameters : Flow 4500 lpm / SPP 282 bar / 180 rpm / 12 MT WOB /  Torque 24 kNm / ECD 1,37.  ROP 1-2 m/hrs. Log response indicating top of Ty penetrated. Dynamic losses approx 3 m3/hrs. Lost connection with PowerDrive sensors, incl, az, GR.
Circulated bottoms up at 4500 lpm to obtain bottom sample.
Circulated bottoms up at 4500 lpm to obtain bottom sample. Dynamic losses 1,8 m3/hrs.
Obtained sample and verified section TD at 2572,5 m MD, 19 m MD into Ty formation.

Lined up pumps to pump Calcarb/Graphite LCM pill down drillstring. Pumped 19 m3 LCM pill at 2000 lpm while rotating 30 rpm. Spotted pill from 2572,5 m MD to 2567 m MD. Broke connection and spotted pill from 2567 m to 2529 m MD. Checked for losses - no static losses.
Cirulated well clean. Stepped up pumps to 4500 lpm and reciprocated on stand with 120/180 rpm rotation. Reset Powerdrive according to instructions from DD. Dynamic losses 0,5 m3/hrs.
Broke connection set back stand and continued to clean well on next stand. Circulated at 4500 lpm with 120/180 rpm rotation while reciprocating string.
Circulate hole clean at 4500 lpm and 120/180 rpm rotation while reciprocating on stand.
Flow checked well - well static.

POOH with 17 1/2" drilling BHA on 5 1/2" DP from 2528 m to 1357 m MD: Pulled wet pipe. Minor tightspots (max 10 MT overpull) observed at : 2254, 2252, 2120, 1924, 1939, 1652, 1535 m MD. Intervall 1520 m to 1480 m MD, max 18 MT overpull. Intervall 1385 m to 1357 m MD, max 18 MT overpull. No rotation and/or circulation needed.
Flow checked well inside casing  shoe - well static. Pumped 10 m3 of 1,55 sg slug for pulling dry pipe.
POOH with 17 1/2" drilling BHA on 5 1/2" DP from 1357 m to 830 m MD. Got problems with iron roughneck.
Repaired bursted hydraulic hose in iron roughneck dragchain
Continued to POOH with 17 1/2" drilling BHA on 5 1/2" DP/HWDP from 830 m to 200 m MD.
Flow checked well prior to pulling 17 1/2" BHA - well static. Removed automatic slips and installed masterbushing.
Pulled 17 1/2" drilling BHA from 200 m to 63 m MD. Racked back drillcollars, jar and intensifier.
Rigged up adapter and transfer shield on top of ADN tool. Removed RA from ADN source and transferred same to transportation container.
Broke out and laid down ADN, Sonic and ARC logging tools. Laid down Powerdrive.
Cleared and tidied rigfloor.
Made up cement stand with pups and singel. Not able to rack back because cement head was to heavy causing buckling of 5 1/2" DP. Broke out and laid down pipe again. Left 4,5 m pup on cement head.
Made up WBRRT tool and jet sub on 5 1/2" HWDP. RIH and located pipe accross BOP. Operated rams. Jetted/washed BOP with 2000 lpm.
RIH with WBRRT tool. Measured out pipe and washed accross nominal seat protector twice with 3000 lpm. Latched on to nominal seat protector at 140,12 m MD and released same with 15 MT overpull.
Dropped 2 15/16" drift. POOH with WBRRT/nominal seat protector on 5 1/2" HWDP. Retrieved drift and laid down WBRRT tool.
Rig up for running 14" casing. Installed casing tong on iron roughneck and hooked up hydralics. Hooked up FAC tool to TDS. Changed links and elevator.
14"  air operated elevator needed dual air inlet, but only one available from TDS. Produced and hooked up hose tee on elevator air supply.

Attempted to pick up and make up cement head to 5 1/2" pup joint and singel in mouse hole and rack back in collar finger - nogo. Stand was bending and it could not be set back as the PRS needed to change grip for racking. Broke out singel and laid down cement head and singel.
Held prejob meeting prior to running 14" casing. Meanwhile finished hooking up 14" casing running equipment.
P/U shoe joint and hung off in rotary.
Took time out as adviced by Statoil drilling supervisor. Emphasized that everyone working regulary on the drillfloor should use proper radio gear.
Picked up and made up 14" intermediate joint and float collar joint. Threadlocked couplings. Used manual slips when handling. Tested shoe and float collar joint for flowthrough and flowback - ok.
Picked up and made up double 14" casing. Threadlocked coupling. Made up 5 m 14" casing pup joint. Filled casing.
Installed Odfjell flush mounted slips in rotary. Tested slips for potential casing lift out, casing lifted out. Adjusted opening pressure of slips, reattempted lift out - ok.
Ran 14" casing according to tally from 68 m to 236 m MD. Filled every joint while running. Average running speed 3-4 jnts/hr.
Ran 14" casing according to tally from 236 m to 390 m MD. Filled every joint while running. Average running speed 5 jnts/hr.
Ran 14" casing according to tally from 390 m to 580 m MD. Filled every joint while running. Average running speed 5-6 jnts/hr.
Ran 14" casing according to tally from 580 m to 1357 MD. Filled every joint while running. Average running speed 6 jnts/hr.

Circulated at 20" shoe at 1357 m. Pumped 220 lpm and broke circulation at 48 bar. Increased pump rate to max 1500 lpm. No losses. Meanwhile serviced casing running equipment and cleared floor of protectors. Up weight 221 MT/ down weight 201 MT.
Ran 14" casing according to tally from 1357 to 1609 MD. Filled every joint while running. Average running speed 5-6 jnts/hr.
Checked Flush Mounted Spider (FMS) for loose/broken items due to cracking sound when MU casing joint. Nothing was found.
Ran 14" casing according to tally from 1609 to 1752 m MD. Filled every joint while running. Average running speed 6-7 jnts/hr.
Ran 14" casing according to tally from 1752 to 2182 MD. Filled every joint while running. Average running speed 6-7 jnts/hr.
Ran 14" casing according to tally from 2182 m to 2422 m MD. Filled every joint while running. Average running speed 7 jnts/hr.
Remove FMC slips and installed master bushing/manual slips. RD FAC tool and 500 MT elevator. RU rig bails and elevator.
PU and MU 14" casing hanger. RIH and jammed casing coupling in inner bushings in rotary table.
Trouble-shooted casing coupling jamming. Removed inner bushing and master bushing. Ran casing hanger through rotary. Installed bushings and sat slips.
Removed casing tong and stored on set back area.

Ran 14" casing according to tally from 2427 m to 2512 m MD. Took max 40 MT weight at 2512 m. MU TDS, broke circulation and attempted to pass restriction. No go. Started to circulate at 220 lpm, 12 bar and increased flow to 470 lpm, 14.3 bar. Broke free upwards with 400 MT/down 296 MT.
Washed 14" casing down from 2512 m to 2513 m MD, 550 lpm, 16 bar, 20-25 MT down weight.
Continued to work through tight spot and washed 14" casing down from 2513 m to 2513.5 m MD, 1000-1400 lpm, 18-40 bar, 25-35 MT down weight. Max allowed pressure was 55 bar.

Continued to work through tight spot and washed 14" casing down from 2513.5 m to 2514.5 m MD, 1400-2000 lpm, 20-40 bar, 20-45 MT down weight. Max allowed pressure was 55 bar. Observed loss at 2000 lpm.
Continued to work on tight spot at 2515 m MD, 200-2000 lpm/ max 60 bar and max 70 MT down weight. Free upweight 430-470 MT.
Pumped out of hole, 200 lpm,  and RB 3 stds HWDP. Free upweight ~430-470 MT in Lista Fm. Above Lista Fm, free upweight 410-420 MT.
RU casing tong.  BO 14" casing hanger and LD same.
Held tool box meeting prior to RU and LO casing. Changed bails and elevators. RU air lines to TDS.
POOH and LD 5 joints of 14" csg from 2422 m to 2357 m MD.

Made up to TDS and pumped 5m³ 1.6 SG slug. Continued POOH from 2916m to 1748m. Draw work brake unable to release.
