Continued POOH from 1748m to 1586m.
Changed out to 5" DP handling equipment. Continued POOH from 1586 to 130m. Rectified problem with draw work.
Flow checked well, well static. Held tool box talk prior to L/O BHA.
Continued POOH w/ BHA and L/O same.
Cleaned and cleared rig floor. Function tested BOP.
Held tool box talk prior to R/U 7" liner handling equipment. R/U 7" liner handling equipment.
Held tool box talk prior to RIH w/ 7" liner.
P/U shoe, float, and landing collar. Made up same with Bakerlock. RIH w/ 7" liner from 39m to 63m
Continued RIH w/ 7" liner from 63m to 147m, filling every 5th. joint.
Held tool box talk with day shift prior to RIH w/ 7" liner.  Continued RIH w/ 7" liner from 147m to 440m, filling every 5th. joint. Problem M/U 7" liner joints.
Laid out 4 joints due to damaged threads and replaced w/ the 3 back-up.

Changed to 5½" DP elevators. P/U hanger/TSP packer assembly and made up same as per Weatherford procedure. Removed 7" FMS slips, installed master bushing. Filled PBR with Hi-visc mud. Took up/down weight 86/83 MT
R/D Odfjell 7" casing tong. Removed HTS rollers, cleared and cleaned rig floor.
Held tool box prior to RIH w/ 7" liner on 5½" DP.
Installed PS-21 slips. Continued RIH w/ 7" liner on 5½" DP from 487m to  3036m, filling every 5th stand. Entered 9 5/8" liner @ 2404m without any obstructions.
Continued RIH w/ 7" liner on 5½" DP from 3036m to  3480m, filling every 5th stand.
Established circulation @ 500 lpm 34 bars. Continued RIH washing down w/ 7" liner on 5½" DP from 3480m and tagged TD at 3520m. Down/up weigth 144/187 MT.
Racked back one stand. Made up 3m + 2m pup joints.
Made up cement head and connected up to TDS. Ran and tagged bottom to verify TD at 3520m. Set down 3 MT. Picked to 1 meter to 3519m.
Circulated 1½ open hole volume @ 1330 lpm  75 bars. Held pre-cement job meeting. Pressure tested cement line to Lo-torque valve at cement head.
Dropped ball and commenced setting the liner hanger according to Weatherford procedure.
Completed installation of the 7" line hanger.
Circulated 1 bottoms up @ 2000 lpm, 151 bars, 20 rpm, 17-18 kNm.

Pumped 15 m³ of 1.65 SG Tuned Spacer E+ at 1500 lpm with the mud pumps. Closed Top Drive IBOP. Maintained 20 bar above IBOP. Dropped bottom DPD #1 dart, good indication with flag. 
Pumped 12.7 m³ 1.90 SG cement slurry at 800 lpm, rotating the string 20 rpm 16-19 kNm. Displaced cement line to rig floor w/ 890 l fresh water.
Dropped DPD #2 dart for releasing wiper plug. Displace cement with 41.5 m³ (1893 strokes) OBM at 1500 lpm, 20 rpm string rotation. Had max 25 kNm . Wiper plug bumped @ 1893 stroks, applied 170 bars to Wiper plug for verification. Bled off pressure and checked for backflow. No losses during the entire cement job.
Installed TSP packer according to Weatherford procedure. Up/down weight 175/140 MT
Circulated well clean w/ 1.4 SG OBM @ 1700-2200 lpm, 62-102 bars, total pumped 353m³. Had spacer and cement in returns.
Flow checked well. Well static. Meanwhile held tool box talk prior to L/O cement head.
Released running tool. L/O cement head pup joints and racked back one stand.
Installed 2 spong balls, made up string to TDS and pumped down the spong balls with 32m³ (string volume)
Pumped slug of 1.6 SG OBM. POOH w/ 7" TSP packer running tool from 2980m to 36m.
Removed PS-21 slips and installed master bushing. Continued POOH w/ TSP packer running tool and L/O same.
Cleared & cleaned rig floor, checked dies in AFT PRS.
Held tool box talk prior to pick BOP and WH clean out assy.
M/U clean out assy. and RIH same to 330m. Positioned jet sub in WH  at 138m and washed WH, Riser and BOP reciprocating the washing assy. across the specified areas. w/ 2500 lpm, 52 bars and 30 rpm.
Continued cleaning out the WH and BOP.
Laid out washing assy.
Held tool box talk prior to change out handling equipment and picking up clean out assy.
Changed out handling equipment to 3 ½", dies in AFT AR, BX elevators inserts and insert of the PS-21..
M/U 7" liner clean out assy. w/ 6" bit and 7" scaper. RIH on 3½" DP from surface to 280m
Continued RIH with clean out assy. on 3½" DP from 280 to 450m
Changed elevator inserts to 5" DP. P/O 9 5/8" Razor Back Scraper pick up weight 80 MT. Re-dressed PS-21 and Iron roughneck to 5" DP. Removed HTS rollers. RIH with 5" DP from 465m to 1062m.
Made up 4½" IF to 5½" FH X-O. M/U string to TDS, filled string prior to pressure testing of the 7" liner.

Held tool box talk prior to pressure testing of the 7" liner. Spaced out to middle pipe rams. Confirmed line up, leak tested line up to 310 bars 5 mins. Pressure tested 7" liner pressuring up in increments to 310 bars, 10 mins.
Bled off pressure, had 4098 l in return. Broke out 4½" IF to 5½" FH X-O. Lined up to BOP.

P/U Tie Back Mill. Held tool box talk prior to change out 5" handling equipment to 5½" handling equipment. P/U MFCT, Razor Back Scraper. Re-dressed PS-21 slips and elevators to 5½" DP. Checked flow rate/pressures. 58spm/103bars - 95spm/250bars.
Continued RIH with Clean out assy. on 5½" DP  from 1121m to 2008m.  Checked flow rate/pressures. 58spm/118bars - 95spm/247bars

Continued RIH with Clean out assy. on 5½" DP  from 2008m to 3017m.  Checked flow rate/pressures. 54spm(1240lpm)/104bars - 95spm(2101lpm)/254bars. Pumped 50m³ conditioned mud @ 106 spm, 2330 lpm 300 bars with 20 rpm 11 kNm. Took up/down weight 164/132 MT with pumps off.

Continued RIH with Clean out assy. on 5½" DP  from 3017m to 3096m. M/U to TDS and scarped TCP gun hanger setting depth, from 3090m to 3125m with 100 spm, 300 bars, 40 rpm and 10-14 kNm. Rotation weight 147 MT.
Continued RIH with Clean out assy. on 5½" DP from 3132m to 3420m.

M/U to TDS, confirmed depth with tally. Pumped 1196 lpm / 120 bars,  2016 lpm / 260 bars and  2120 lpm / 289 bars, at 40 rpm. Scraped from 3427m to 3457m bit depth = 2970m to 3000m scraper depth. Up/Down weight 174/139 MT.

Continued RIH from 3457m and tagged top of 9 5/8" PBR at 2405,5 m (3473.8m bit depth). Picked back rotated string at 50 rpm - 50 spm - 92 bars and 11-14 kNm. Slacked off slowly w/ 50 RPM with the Top Dress Mill assembly and set down 1-2 tonn on top of the PBR for a few minutes. Pulled out of the PBR with rotation.
Pulled bottom of polish mill 5 meter above liner top and reciprocated the string while conditioning the mud 40 rpm, 96 spm(2100lpm), 291 bars,
Sheared MFCT by setting down 24 MT on PBR with top dress mill.  Opened the circulation ports. Established circulation of 191 spm(4200lpm) 230 bars, 40 rpm, 9 kNm kept 6.8 MT down weight.
Held tool box talk prior to clean out services lines.
Commenced cleaning of surface equipment with Base oil then soap pil.
Continued cleaning of surface equipment. Meanwhile injected slops.
Filled sandtraps with base oil from pit # 10 & circulated through lines in shakers with base oil.
Mixed soap pill in pit # 10, flushed soap pill through all possible surface lines  at maximum rate of 4000 lpm.
Held tool box talk prior to prepare fluid used for well clean out. Prepared treated SW, pills and cleaned pits. Meanwhile closed bag and opened piperam. Pulled up +/- 1m to close MFCT.
Prepared seawater pre-mix prior to displacement.
Started displacing well with soap train to MFCT at 1000 lpm up chokeline. When pill at bit DP pressure reading:230 bars.
Continued displacing well with soap train to above MFCT at 1000 lpm, 230 bars constant DP pressure up choke line.
Stopped pumping. Closed in the well with 200 bars DP, 170 bars choke pressure. Opened MFCT setting down weight.
Circulated well at 2800 lpm, holding choke pressure constant at 170 bars. New DP pressure 270 bars. Continued circulating 2800 lpm 270 bars constant DP pressure w/ treated sea water
Closed in well @ 80 bars when treated sea water at surface. Bled off the pressure from 80 bars in two steps to zero, prior to taking inflow test over the trip tank. Lined up to trip tank.
Inflow tested well over the trip tank for 30 mins. - OK
Spaced out and closed pipe rams. Pressure tested well 20/345 bars 5/10 mins with treated sea water. Simultaneously mixing for displacing the well with treated sea water below 100 NTU
Continued to clean surface lines. Prepared to pump TSW.
With MFCT in open position, pumped TSW at 3400 lpm / SPP 284 bar. Total volume pumped 365 m3. NTU reading levelled out at approx 150.
Closed MFCT. POOH with cleaning assembly on 5 1/2" DP from 3474 m to 3177 m MD. Observed 12 mm locking nut falling from derrick, halted operation.
Performed FG inspection in derrick. Lock nut traced to clamp on ladder to crown block.
Continued to POOH with cleaning assembly on 5 1/2" DP from 3177 m to 1080 m MD.
Changed from 5 1/2" to 5" handling equipment.
Broke out and laid down 14" Razor back assy #5 and Tie-back/top dress mill assy #4.
Continued to POOH on 5" DP from 1062 m to 465 m MD. Changed inserts and jaws on IR to 3 1/2" DP. Changed to 3 1/2" inserts in elevator.
Broke out and laid down 9 5/8" Razor back assy #3.
POOH with cleaning assy on 3 1/2" DP from 465 m to 14 m MD.
Broke out and laid down 7" Razor back assy #2. Laid out assy #1, pup with 6" bit. Changed to 5 1/2" handling equipment.
Made up Wear Bushing Running and Retrieving Tool (WBRRT) to stand of 5 1/2" HWDP. Checked tool.

RIH with WBRRT on 5 1/2" HWDP. Checked serial numbers of HWDP on way in. Found deviation in tally on joint #7 / std#2, serial number was incorrect compared to tally. Control measured joint and found a lenght deviation of 4,5 cm compared to tally.
RIH with WBRRT on 5 1/2" HWDP while measuring lenghts on all joints. Found several lenght deviations ranging from a few mm to mamximum 11 cm. Found one more wrong serial number.
Latched onto WB at 139,5 m MD and pulled same with 25 MT overpull. Broke circulation and washed across wellhead with 3000 lpm using TSW.
POOH with WB/WBRRT on 5 1/2" HWDP. Control measured 6 more 5 1/2" HWDP joints on way out. Recalculated total tally with new measures and found a deviation of only 2 mm.
Rigged up casing tong, flush mounted spider and elevator for running 9 5/8" x 10 3/4" tie-back casing.
Held toolbox meeting prior to start running 9 5/8" x 10 3/4" tie-back casing.
Ran 9 5/8" tie back casing to 798 m MD.

Held toolbox talk prior changing elevator. Changed elevator from 9 5/8" to 10 3/4" BX3.
Found leakage on hydraulic fitting on 10 3/4" BX3 elevator.
Changed hydraulic fitting and bolt head connection for return line on 10 3/4" BX3 elevator.
Picked up and made up 9 5/8" x 10 3/4" x-over. Changed slips segments in flush mounted spider. Hung off on x-over and installed casing swage on top of 10 3/4" casing.
Slip and cut drilline.
Performed 6 monthly maintenance and inspection of crown block.
Removed block hang off sling. Calibrated block.
Held toolbox talk prior to recommencing casing running. Broke off and laid down casing swage.
Continued to run 10 3/4" casing from 811 m to 1141 m MD.
Ran 10 3/4" tie-back casing from 1141 m to 2262 m MD. Average running speed 8 jnts/hr.
Changed from 10 3/4" BX3 elevator to 5 1/2" DP elevator.
Picked up and made up 10 3/4" casing hanger complete with isolation sleeve and PADPRT tool
Removed spider from rotary and installed bushings. Removed casing tong.
RIH with 10 3/4" casing/hanger on 5 1/2" HWDP landing string. Strapped pipe on way in.

Made up TDS. Took up/down weights 253/199 MT. Pumped at 450 lpm while running in slowly with landing string. Observed pressure bulid up and lost returns at 2406,4 m MD indicating seals engaging 9 5/8" liner sealbore. Stopped pumps. Observed stinger shroud shearing some 1,20 m further in and got hanger landing depth 0,8 m (total of 1.2+0.8=2m) further in at 2408,4 m MD.
Performed low pressure test of stinger seals to 70 bar / 10 min - ok.
Marked pipe with 72 MT and 128 MT hookload. Applied 7 MT on PADPRT tool and rotated 4 1/4 turn clockwise to set tool. Pipe dropped 8,5" as intended. Closed UPR.
Held toolbox talk prior to setting MS seal. Pressured up to 207 bar with cement unit through kill line for 10 mins to set the MS seal. Volume pumped 272 liters.
Opened UPR and pulled 50 MT above landing string weight to unset PADPRT tool. Pressure tested MS seal to 35/345 bar 5/10 mins. Volumed pumped 447 liters.
POOH with PADRT tool on 5 1/2" HWDP. Laid down PADPRT tool.

Closed shear ram and lined up to pressure up underneath with cement unit. Pressured up with cement unit to 345 bar. Pumped a total of 2630 liter on 1st attempt, good correlation with theoretical volume. Observed trendline which did not stabilize - steady drop observed at around 1 bar/min. Pressured up twice to 345 bar - same trend observed. Total volume pumped 2860 liters Attempted to bleed pressure back to cement unit - nogo, kill line blocked for unknown reason. Bled back to trip tank and recovered 2500 liters. Decided to re-attempt pressure test up cement line.
Lined up from cement unit pumping up cement line. Flushed through and performed line test to 345 bar - ok.

Troubleshot leakage in well. Pressured up on well to 345 bar from cement unit through cement line. Similar trendline observed with leakage rate of 0,5-1 bar/min. Pressured up on well twice more. Bled off pressure rapidly and lined back to cement unit. Pressure on cement unit rose from 2,8 bar to 7 bar over 2 hrs. Meanwhile discussed situation and way forward. Prepared for running MS seal retrieval tool.

Picked up MS seal retirevel tool and inspected seals. RIH with retrieval tool on 5 1/2" HWDP landing string as per Vetco procedure. Engaged tool by 1/2" turn lefthand. Set down landing string weight of 10 MT instead of the intended 3 MT. Adjusted string weight and string jumped approx 0,3 m, got sudden gain in trip tank of approx 250 liter. Closed annular and pulled MS seal free with 10 MT overpull. POOH with retireval tool and MS seal on 5 1/2" HWDP. Backed off MS seal, re-set running tool and laid down same.
Inspected MS seal and found scores on seal. Discussed situation. Prepared hanger jet and wash tool.

Picked up and made ut Vetco jet and wash tool. RIH with tool on 5 1/2" HWDP landing string. Tagged top of 10 3/4 casing hanger. Washed seal area, rotated with 3 rpm while pumping at 2200 lpm. POOH with jet and wash tool. Discussed way forward.
Prepared for running WBBRT w/10 3/4" wearbushing. Picked up WBRRT, checked tool and installed 10 3/4" wearbushing.  RIH with tool WBRRT/wearbushing on 5 1/2" HWDP landing string.
Set wearbushing at 140,2 m MD. POOH with WBRRT and laid down tool.
Hung off RTTS in rotary and made up to stand of 5 1/2" HWDP. Installed automatic slips.
RIH with 9 5/8" RTTS on 5 1/2" DP/HWDP to 1650 m MD.

Took up/down weights 132/117 MT. Roateted string to set RTTS packer. Slacked of 30 MT on the running string and set packer at 1650 m MD. Lined up to pump from cement unit up cement line and standpipe. Closed standpipe valve and performed line test to 345 bar - ok.

Pressurised well below RTTS packer in 50 bar increments. Held each step for 10 mins. Good tests obtained at 50, 100, 150, 200, 250 bar - no gain in trip tank observed. Total volume pumped at 250 bar was 1129 liter.
At 300 bar leakage was observed, pressure dropped 7 bar / 10 min - also gained 40 liters in triptank over 10 mins. Volume pumped 1332 liter. Bled off pressure on well.
Released RTTS. POOH on 5 1/2" DP/HWDP with RTTS. Removed automatic slips and master bushing. Laid down RTTS.
Picked up WBRRT set in retrieval mode. RIH with WBRRT on 5 1/2" HWDP landing string. Latched on to 10 3/4" wearbushing at 140 m MD and pulled free with 40 MT overpull.
Picked up PADRT tool set in catch mode. RIH on 5 1/2" HWDP landing string and latched on to 10 3/4" hanger according to Vetco instructions.
Picked up with 255 MT hookload and POOH with 9 5/8" x 10 3/4" tie back casing on 5 1/2" HWDP landing string. Removed master bushing.
Held toolbox talk prior to rigging 10 3/4" casing handling equipment. Installed casing tong, BX3 elevator and spider.
Held toolbox talk prior to laying down 10 3/4" casing hanger / casing. Broke and laid down hanger and PADRT tool.
POOH with 10 3/4" tie-back casing from 2265 m to 1670 m MD. Average pulling speed 11 jnts/hr.
POOH with 10 3/4" casing from 1670 m to 822 m MD. Average pulling speed 13 jnts/hr.
Continued pulling 10 3/4" casing from 822 m to 798 m MD. Hung off on x-over. Broke out and laid down 9 5/8" x 10 3/4" x-over. Changed to 9 5/8" elevator.
POOH with 9 5/8" casing from 798 m to 550 m MD.
Changed dies in casing tong from 9 3/4" to 9 5/8" (arrived on boat).
Continued to POOH with 9 5/8" casing from 550 m to 40 m MD.
Removed spider and installed master bushing. POOH from 40 m MD. Laid down seal stinger. Inspected seals, lower seals missing and significant damage to rest of seals.
Held tolbox talk prior to breaking back up TSP assembly. Cleared and tidied drillfloor. Changed to 5 1/2" inserts in elevator.
Picked up TSP assembly. Broke 9 5/8" connection and installed by pass ball drop seat. Re-made 9 5/8" connection and laid down tool on pipedeck.
Picked up WBRRT. Broke out jet sub and configured tool for BOP testing. RIH with WBRRT and 14" wearbushing on 5 1/2" HWDP landing and set same in wellhead.
Broke TDS connection and parked travelling block for maintenance.
Pressure tested BOP to 35/345 bar 5/10 min according to Mærsk USP.
Pressure tested BOP to 35/345 bar 5/10 min according to Mærsk USP.
Released WBRRT and POOH with same on 5 1/2" HWDP landing string. Re-set tool on surface. Laid down WBRRT on pipe deck. Meanwhile function tested shear ram.

Picked up 9 5/8" x 14" TSP assembly with simultaneous lift on elevator and deck crane. Inspected seals. Hung off assy in rotary. Removed masterbushing and installed automatic slips. RIH with TSP on 5 1/2" DP to 100 m MD.
RIH with TSP assy on 5 1/2" DP from 100 m to 2397 m MD. Running speed limited to 2 mins/std.

Dropped 1 3/4" aluminium ball. Took up/down weights 160/131 MT. Continued to RIH with TSP packer from 2397 m ti 2412 m MD. Applied 10 MT on TSP assy. Pressured up string to 230 bar / 440 lpm. Observed pressure for 5 mins. Increased pressure and observed shear at 268 bar.
Pulled out 4 m and set packer by applying 40 MT on top of PBR. Adjusted weight to 10 MT. Verifed new top of PBR to 2398.05 m MD.
Closed UPR,  lined up from cement unit to BOP, and pressure tested TSP packer and annulus to 180 bar - ok. Volumed pumped 1632 liters.
POOH with TSP setting tool on 5 1/2" DP from 2408 to 2350 m MD. Observed hydraulic leak on aft PRS.
Repaired hydraulic leak on aft PRS.
Continued to POOH with TSP setting tool on 5 1/2" DP from 2350 m to 200 m MD.
Held toolbox talk. Removed automatic slips from rotary.
Continued to POOH with TSP setting tool from 200 m MD to surface. Laid down tool in basket on main deck.

RIH with WBRRT on 5 1/2" HWDP landing string. Latched on to 14" WB at 140 m MD and pulled free with 30 MT overpull. Washed across subsea wellhead with 3000 lpm. POOH with WB/WBRRT on 5 1/2" HWDP landing string.

Laid down WBRRT. Installed swedge and tested IBOP valves on TDS and standpipe valve to 35/345 bar 5/10 mins. 

Meanwhile :
-Backloaded used casing. Loaded, tallied and laid out new casing in stb pipedeck bays. 
-Repaired hydraulic hose on topdrive
-Tested valves on kill manifold to 35/345 bar 5/10 mins.

Rigged up casing OWS casing tong. Changed inserts in elevator. Redressed PS-21 slips.

Meanwhile :
-Backloaded used casing. Loaded, tallied and laid out new casing in stb pipedeck bays.

Backloaded used casing. Loaded, tallied and laid out new casing in stb pipedeck bays. 

Meanwhile :
-Barriered off drillfloor and commenced service on forward PRS
Had to halt loading casing temporarily. Supply boat Island Frontier reported trouble which could affect station keeping. Boat pulled away temporarily.

Loaded,  tallied and laid out new 10 3/4" casing in aft stb/port bays. Produced running tally. Counted joints on deck. 

Meanwhile :
-Pressure tested choke manifold to 35/345 bar 5/10 mins
-Pressure tested TIW and gray valve to 35/345 bar 5/10 mins
Broke down TIW and Gray valve after pressure testing same.

Held toolbox talk prior to running 9 5/8" x 10 3/4" tie-back casing. Picked up seal stem assy. Commenced to run in hole with 9 5/8" casing. Got problem closing/functioning elevator. Halted operations to remedy situation.
Changed hydraulic fitting on BX elevator.

RIH with 9 5/8" tie-back casing from surface to 374 m MD. Observed high thread torque on several joints.Observed some dry boxes. Had to lay out joint #57, #52 and #48 due to 70% thread torque on JAM unit and damaged threads. Used contingency dope LubeSeal API mod as required on pin end  after joint #48. Average running speed less 4 jnts/hr.
RIH with 9 5/8" tie-back casing from 374 m to 798 m MD. Washed pin ends and applied contingency dope as required. Average running speed 6 jnts/hr.
Changed to 10 3/4" BX3 elevator. Picked up and made up 9 5/8" x 10 3/4" x-over.
Held toolbox talk. Removed PS-21 slips and changed to 10 3/4" inserts, put slips back in rotary.  Repositioned rollers on HTS. Adjusted PDM head.
Held toolbox meeting prior to running 10 3/4" tie-back casing. Ran 10 3/4" casing from 796 m to 1505 m MD. Average running speed 8 jnts/hr. Experienced problems with HTS conveyer belt.
Repaired conveyer belt.
Continued to run 10 3/4" tie-back casing. Average running speed 10 jnts/hr. Monkey arm on HTS jammed in upper position.
Mærsk ET techican fixed problem on software.
Continued to run 10 3/4" tie-back casing from 1920 m to 2253 m MD.

Picked up 6,05 m 10 3/4" pup joint made up and RIH with same. Changed elveator. Picked up 10 3/4" casing hanger, washed, inspected and doped threads. Made up 10 3/4" casing hanger. Checked tally and counted joints left on deck - ok.
Rigged down casing tong. Removed casing slips. Checked PADPRT tool.
RIH with 9 5/8" x 10 3/4" tie-back casing, hanger and PADPRT tool on 5 1/2" HWDP landing string. Set depth counter at 2385 m MD. Took up and down weights 250/200 MT.

Brought pumps up to 350 lpm and ran in hole with tie-back casing. Observed pressure increase and loosing weight at 2399 m MD. Stung approx 1 m further in and PBR locator in sealstem sheard out. Total sting in 2,7 m.  Landed hanger at 140,1 m MD as per Vetco datum.
Lined up to pump from cement unit up kill line through TDS. Performed low pressure test on sealstinger to 70 bar/10 min - ok. Recorded on chart.
Adjusted block weight to 73 MT. Rotated string 4 turns clockwise to activate PADPRT tool, observed 8,5" drop as intended. Closed UPR and pressured up above PADRT tool to 207 bar to set MS seal - ok.
With UPR closed, pressure tested MS seal from above to 35/345 bar 5 /10 min - ok. Released PADPRT tool according to Vetco instructions and POOH with same on 5 1/2" HWDP landing string.

Flushed lines. Closed Shear ram. Pressure tested 9 5/8" x 10 3/4" tie-back casing and sealstem/PBR to 35/345 bar 5/10 min  - ok. Pumped and bled back a total of 2637 liter, good correspondance with theoretical volume.
Picked up 10 3/4" lock down sub and RIH on 5 1/2" HWDP landing string to 140 m. Set same according to Vetco instruction. Closed UPR and pressure tested lock down sub to 345 bar/10 min.
POOH with RT on 5 1/2" HWDP landing string.
Tidied drillfloor and removed casing running equipment for backload.
Held toolbox talk. Picked up special 9,567" casing drift and RIH with same on 5 1/2" DP to 200 m MD.
Installed automatic slip. RIH with drift on 5 1/2" DP and drifted well down to 1590 m MD. Observed 1-3 MT drag from 1439 m to 1536 m MD.
POOH with casing drift on 5 1/2" DP and laid down same.
Built stand of 5 1/2" HWDP.

Picked up 10 3/4" GTV plug assembly. RIH with GTV plug on 5 1/2" HWDP/DP to 641 m MD. Measured 2 stands while running in. Took up/down weights 102/98 MT. Set GTV plug by applying clockwise rotation and alernating up down loads. Plug setting depth 641 m MD (mid packer element).

Lined up from cement unit and performed line test to 345 bar/10 min - ok. Pressured up below GTV plug through DP and tested to 345 bar/10 min. Pumped 2150 liter with good correpsondance to theroretical volume. Recovered only 1800 liter. Discussed situation. Decided to move ahead with operations.
Released from GTV plug and pumped 10 m3 hi-vis on top of plug. POOH with GTV plug setting tool on 5 1/2" HWDP/DP. Laid down setting tool.
Closed shear ram and lined up cement unit to pump in BOP. Pressure tested above GTV plug to 345 bar / 10 min - ok. Volume pumped / bled back 863/830 liters.
Made up stand of drillpipe. Emptied BOP for water by blowing air down the DP.
Removed elevator and prepared slings for pulling diverter.
Continued preparing for releasing and pulling diverter.
Held toolbox talk prior to pulling diverter.

Attempted to pull diverter - nogo - stuck in diverter housing. Removed lid to access lock dogs. Inspected locks and found chunks of metal in cavities, verified lock dogs free to move. Adjusted elevation. Worked diverter up and down. Diverter came free. Lifted out and set down on  drillfloor.
Cleared drillfloor. Transferred Claxton tool to drillfloor.
Held toolbox meeting prior to nippling BOP overshot. Meanwhile worked on FWD PRS.
Attempted to release lock ring on overshot. Used, C-spanner, chain hoists slings

Sourced torque tool for relasing flange on top of annular BOP instead of lock ring. Attempted to break bolts on flange - negative. Reverted to plan for releasing lock ring. Meanwhile reinforced C-spanners in mechanical workshop and continued work on PRS.
Worked to release overshot lock ring. Used C-spanner, chain hoists and slings. Meanwhile worked on FWD PRS.

Worked to release overshot lock ring. Used C-spanner, chain hoist. Rigged up eagle clamp and sheave. Pulled on lock ring C-spanner with tugger. Lock ring came free and was unscrewed by hand. Total thight turns approx 2,5. Meanwhile worked on FWD PRS.
Removed tools and slings from BOP. Attached sling to overshot and lifted same to drillfloor with tugger. Installed masterbushing, bushings and hole cover.
Prepared for skidding BOP. Released NT-2 connector and removed obstacles in moonpool. Cleared and tidied drillfloor.
Continued nippling down BOP. Prepared for skidding BOP. Got problems with hydraulics on BOP trolley.
Troubleshot problems with BOP trolley.
Skidded BOP on trolley and landed same on test stump.
Helt toolbox talk prior to running Claxton tool.
Picked up Claxton tool and made up to stand of 5 1/2" HWDP.

Held toolbox talk. Landed Claxton tool i NT-2 connector on HPDR. Made up Claxton tool to NT-2 with Hytorq tool. Applied 2700 ft lbs on studs.

Weather at 1430 :
Wind 19 m /s
Hs 3,8 / max 7,5
Watied on weather. Meanwhile worked on PRS.

Watied on weather. Meanwhile prepared for tranferring tension to block. Removed scaffolding and secured hatches on Centralizer deck.

Weather at 0100 :
Wind 9,7 m /s
Hs 2,8 / max 4,1

Held prejob meeting on Centralizer deck. Bled off pressure on tension cylinders and transferred 60 MT tension to block. Disconnected tension cylinder 1 and 3. Landed tensioner assembly on wooden chucks.

Disconnected cylinder 2 and 4 from tensioner assembly. Dismantled tensioner assembly. Removed tension ring. Removed boat collision stool and centralizer. Installed  protector guides on Centralizer deck and landed tension ring in same. Installed protector guide on Tensioning deck. Meanwhile deployed hotstab on tuggerline through slot F-1. Engaged hotstab in hydraulic receptacle on TBC.

Weather at 0600 :
Wind 6,7 m /s
Hs 2,2 / max 3,4
Removed scaffolding on Weatherdeck due to potential clash with HPDR riser. Tidied Centralizer deck.
Waited on weather.
Held toolbox talk prior to disconnecting HPDR from wellhead.

Set valves on HPDR TBC. Set down weight to 55 MT. Pressurised primary unlock on TBC through minireel and hotstab. Lifted clear of wellhead/template in one continuos stroke. Hung of on handling sub, broke off and set back 5 1/2" DP stand. No VX-ring observed on wellhead - assumed still contained in TBC.
Held toolbox talk prior installing riser spider.
Removed bushings. Installed riser spider.

POOH with Tension joint and BOP joint double. Hung off in riser spider. Broke connection according to Vetco/Bandak procedure. Attached soft sling. Observed damage on soft slings. Halted operation to assess situation.
Inspected and rejected both soft sling. Searched for alternative slings - none onboard with sufficient SWL/lenght.
Slung Tension joint with 50 mm steel sling. Lifted same from drillfloor using deck crane. Laid down Tension joint in make up cradle on pipedeck.
POOH with 22" HPDR. Removed fairrings while pulling out. Broke connections according to Vetco/Bandak procedure. Laid down doubles in port side storage rack.

Broke last connection between last doble and TBC joint. Laid out last double and put in port side storage rack. Pulled TBC joint. Inspected lock cavity on TBC, no VX-ring recovered. Slung TBC joint with heavy lift sling and laid down same on pipedeck. Secured rotary. Tidied drillfloor.
Brought 4 tension cylinder to drillfloor. Prepared for mounting cherry picker.
Not allowed access in wellhead module due to ongoing pressure testing on gas lift system. Discussed situation and adjusted barriers accordingly. Meanwhile mounted cherry picker on drillfloor.
Transferred 4 tension cylinders from drillfloor to Tensioning deck. Meanwhile mounted cherry picker on drillfloor.
Dismounted/mounted cylinders on Centralizer deck with tugger support from moonpool. Meanwhile mounted cherry picker on drillfloor.
Continued to dismount/mount tension cylinders in Tensioning deck roof. Used tugger support from moonpool for lifting cylinders.

Prepared for running production riser. Made up Tension joint handling tool to 6 m pup joint. Configured riser spider for running production riser. Prepared tension ring and protector guide in wellhead module.
Performed SJA / toolbox talk prior to running production riser.

Picked up TBC joint and hung off in spider. Removed handling tool. Picked up lower pup joint and landed same on TBC joint. Made up flanged connection according to Vetco/bandak procedure. Installed fairring accross connection.
Placed TBC in in level with scaffolding on Weatherdeck. Function tested TBC according to Vetco instruction. Installed dummy stabs. Oriented lock/unlock panel to 45 deg starboard aft.

Removed handling tool on production riser flange in riser spider. Lifted 1st double with dual lift on block and deckcrane. Made up flanged connection according to Vetco/Bandak procedure. Installed fairring on coupling. Ran in and placed TBC connector in level with Centralizer deck. Prepared guidewires in slot F-11 and F-13. Built scaffolding/barriers around deck openings.

Attached ROV hooks to guide slings. Made rope loop for retrieval of ROV hooks and guide sling clamp. Hauled guidewires with ROV hooks through Centralizer deck, ran to sealevel. Landed 1 st double in riser spider. Ran guidewires individually to 20 m above seabed.

Removed handling tool. Lifted 2nd double to drillfloor with dual lift on block and deck crane. Made up flanged connection according to Vetco/Bandak procedure. RIH with 2nd double. Meanwhile hooked up hydraulics on tension cylinders.

Lifted 3rd double to drillfloor with dual lift on block an deck crane. Removed handling joint. Made up flanged connection according to Vetco procedure. Meanwhile hooked up hydraulics on tension cylinders.

Lifted tension joint to Horizontal position. Hoisted handling flange with 6 m pup joint to horizontal  posistion with tuggers and made up to tension joint.  RIH with 3rd double and landed in spider. Prepared for lifting tension joint to vertical position.
Lifted tension joint to vertical position and MU tension joint flange to upper pup joint.
Split riser spider and removed same.
RIH with tension joint and installed master bushing. MU 5 1/2" landing stand to handling sub.
Prepared ROV to assist landing of PR. Verified that the VX-ring had been installed and checked F-12 well head.
Installed guidewires and lined up to 18 3/4" sub sea WH. Hook load prior to landing was 97 MT.
Installed hot stab in receptacle A and set valves on TBC locking panel to "primary lock" position using ROV. Landed TBC on 18 3/4" WH and sat down 15 MT.
Prepared to set TBC according to Vetco procedures. Pressurized the TBC to 2500 psi using pump and minireel in moonpool. Did not get alignment indicating proper locking of TBC.
Had shut down for Siemens "shut down and fire pump logic" (ESD tests).

Unlocked TBC and repeated connetion procedures according to Vetco instructions. Pressurized the TBC to 3000 psi using pump and minireel in moonpool. Got alignment indicating proper locking of TBC. Sat all valves on lock panel A into "parking position". Performed 20 MT overpull test on H4-MUSL connector (TBC) with TDS. Slacked off to 10 MT overpull. Sat TBC valves on flush panel B to "lower dog flush".
Had shut down for Siemens "shut down and fire pump logic" (ESD tests).
Installed centralizer and boat collision stool on centralizer deck. Prepared for skidding cantilever.
Continued to install centralizer and boat collision stool on centralizer deck. Meanwhile had shut down for Siemens "shut down and fire pump logic" (ESD tests). Restarted all systems.

Installed bleed off valve on tension joint and lined up to fill riser. Held tool box meeting prior to filling riser and performing pressure test. Filled riser using CMT pump and venting air through valve on tension joint. Kept 10 MT overpull on PR.
Performed pressure test of PR to 20 bar/5 min. Volume pumped 70 ltr. Attempted to move TDS to keep tension in PR during pressure testing.
Software problem on TDS (drawworks).
Pressured up PR riser against well/GTV plug to 200 bar and compensated TDS to keep riser in tension. Performed pressure test of PR to 200 bar/10 min. Volume pumped 440 ltr.
Prepared to pumpe corrosion inhibitor through port B1 on TBC using minireel and Vetco pump. Meanwhile finished installing centralizer and boat collision stool on centralizer deck
MU tensioner ring assembly on centralizer deck. Meanwhile prepared rig for skidding and changed liners and piston fluid ends in MP2.
Commisioned all 4 new tension cylinders.
MU tensioner ring assembly on centralizer deck. Meanwhile retrieved riser guide wires from wellhead template and performed area inspection for high wind forcast procedure.
Removed security bolt on RT from PR and POOH. LD RT and 20 ft pup joint. Installed hatch on F-12 and suspended operation to F-7.
Prepared Rig for skidding and skidded rig from F7 to F12.
Skidded the cantilever 1.5 metres to SB.
Lowered down the well head valves.
Prepared main deck for skidding.
Held tool box talk prior to skidding of the cantilever.
Skidded cantilever from F-15 to F-12
Installed stairs to the cantilever. Removed well head hatches.
Prepared for pick up the surface riser.
Held tool box talk prior to pick up the surface riser.
Picked up the surface riser, removed protector. Meanwhile built scaffolding in the moon pool.
Removed the master bushing, ran in with the surface riser. Meanwhile built scaffolding at the well head deck.
Cleaned the NT2 well head connector. Landed and made up the surface riser.
Held tool box talk prior to nippling up the BOP.
Prepared for nippling up the BOP, moved the BOP from the set back stump.
